bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: John Breckinridge Grayson was born in Kentucky and graduated from West Point in 1826. He was an officer in the U.S. Army, served in the Mexican War, and, briefly, as a Confederate brigadier general during the Civil War.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists largely of checks and receipts for money paid out for supplies during the Mexican War. A letter, 1853, concerns the purchase of a farm in Virginia.
